script:module:
REM ***** BASIC ***** dim BoardSheet as object
dim locations as variant dim LocRow as variant dim LocCol as variant dim LocCylonIdx as integer dim SectorRow as variant dim SectorCol as variant
const _BoardPlayerCol = 14 const _BoardPlayerTitleCol = _BoardPlayerCol + 2 const _BoardPlayerRow = 2
const _ViperRowOffset = 2
const _AssignmentCol = 16 const _AssignmentRow = 11
const _Colonial1Col = 0 const _Colonial1Row = 15
const _DetectorCol = 8 const _DetectorRow = 9
const _SpecialsCol = 5 const _SpecialsRow = 10
const _PegasusCol = 15 const _PegasusRow = 33
const _GraveCol = 0 const _GraveRow = 50
const _JumpTrackCol = 6 const _JumpTrackRow = 5
const _PursuitTrackCol = 6 const _PursuitTrackRow = 57
const _DRBBAllegianceCol = 3 const _DRBBAllegianceRow = 38
const _HubDestroyedCol = 15 const _HubDestroyedRow = 15
sub GetBS if BoardSheet <> NULL then exit sub end if
BoardSheet = ThisComponent.Sheets.getByName("Board Status") end sub
sub InitializeSectors SectorCol = array(1, 1, 5, 10, 14, 10, 5) SectorRow = Array(0, 24, 12, 12, 24, 35, 35) end sub
sub InitializeLocations if Locations <> NULL then exit sub end if Locations = Array("Admiral's Quarters", "Armory", "Brig", "Command", "Communications", "FTL Control", "Hangar Deck", "Research Lab", "Sickbay", "Weapons Control" , _ "----------", "Administration", "President's Office", "Press Room", "Quorum Chamber", _ "----------", "Pegasus CIC", "Airlock", "Main Batteries", "Engine Room", _ "----------", "Bridge", "Tactical Plot", "Captain's Cabin", _ "----------", "Hybrid Tank", "Datastream", "Raider Bay", _ "----------", "Resistance HQ", "Occupation Authority", "Breeder's Canyon", "Shipyard", "Medical Center", "Detention", _ "----------", "Caprica", "Cylon Fleet", "Human Fleet", "Resurrection Ship", "Basestar Bridge") LocCylonIdx = Ubound(locations) - 5
LocCol = Array(8, 11, 12, 6, 8, 7, 10, 10, 12, 6, _ -1, 3, 2, 1, 0, _ -1, 15, 16, 17, 18, _ -1, 1, 2, 3, _ -1, 1, 2, 3, _ -1, 17, 17, 19, 21, 15, 15, _ -1, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19) LocRow = Array(29, 25, 29, 29, 21, 25, 29, 21, 21, 21, _ -1, 17, 17, 17, 17, _ -1, 35, 35, 35, 35, _ -1, 33, 33, 33, _ -1, 39, 39, 39, _ -1, 42, 50, 46, 46, 42, 50, _ -1, 17, 17, 17, 17, 17)
end sub 'InitializeLocations
function GetHumanLocCnt as integer GetHumanLocCnt = LocCylonIdx end function
sub Board_RefreshPlayerLoc dim i, j, locid, offset, rowsToClear as integer dim plyrname, locname as string InitializeLocations GetBS
if GetInitFlag() then exit sub end if
' clear the locations
for i = 0 to ubound(loccol) rowsToClear = 4 select case Locations(i) case "----------" rowsToClear = 0
case "Resistance HQ" rowsToClear = 7
case "Breeder's Canyon", "Shipyard" rowsToClear = 8 end select
for j = 1 to rowstoclear BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(LocCol(i), LocRow(i) + j).string = "" next j next i
' now put the players in place for i = 1 to PlayerCnt() plyrname = GetPlayerName(i) locname = GetPlayerLoc(i) ' now find the location if they are on Galactica or Colonial 1 if left(locname,8) <> "Stranded" and left(locname,6) <> "Sector" then for j = 0 to ubound(locations) if locations(j) = locname then locid = j exit for end if next j
offset = 1 do while BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(LocCol(locid), LocRow(locid)+offset).string <> "" offset = offset + 1 loop BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(LocCol(locid),LocRow(locid)+offset).string = plyrname end if next i
end sub
sub Board_RefreshLocationDamage InitializeLocations GetBS
dim locid as integer ' clear the locations
for locid = 0 to GetHumanLocCnt() if IsDamaged(Locations(locid)) then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(LocCol(locid),LocRow(locid)).CellBackColor = _red elseif LocCol(locID) > 0 then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(LocCol(locid),LocRow(locid)).CellBackColor = _bluegrey end if next locid
end sub
sub Board_SetCurrentPlayer dim i, j as integer GetBS
for i = 1 to PlayerCnt() if i = GetCurrentPlayer() then for j = 0 to 4 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BoardPlayerCol+j,_BoardPlayerRow+i).CellBackColor = _yellow next j else for j = 0 to 4 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BoardPlayerCol+j,_BoardPlayerRow+i).CellBackColor = _orange next j end if next i end sub
sub Board_RefreshPlayerTitles dim titlestr as string dim PresID, AdmID, CAGID, i as integer GetBS
if GetInitFlag() then exit sub end if
PresID = GetTitle(_TitlePresident) AdmID = GetTitle(_TitleAdmiral) CAGID = GetTitle(_TitleCAG)
for i = 1 to 7 titlestr = "" if PresID = i then if AdmID = i then if CAGID = i then titlestr = "P/A/C" else titlestr = "Pres/Adm" end if elseif CAGID = i then titlestr = "Pres/CAG" else titlestr = "President" end if
elseif AdmID = i then if CAGID = i then titlestr = "Adm/CAG" else titlestr = "Admiral" end if
elseif CAGID = i then titlestr = "CAG"
elseif IsSympathetic(i) then if GameTypeIsPegasus() then titlestr = "Sympathetic Cylon" else titlestr = "Sympathizer" end if
elseif IsRevealed(i) then titlestr = "CYLON" end if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_BoardPlayerTitleCol,_BoardPlayerRow+i).string = titlestr next i end sub 'Board_RefreshPlayerTitles
sub Board_RefreshPlayerAssignments ' get assignments from the quorum deck ' there are only 3 possible assignments dim asgnCnt, asgnID as integer dim player as string GetBS
if GetInitFlag() then exit sub end if
for asgnID = 0 to 3 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_AssignmentCol,_AssignmentRow + asgnID).string = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_AssignmentCol + 1,_AssignmentRow + asgnID).string = "" next asgnID
asgnCnt = 0 ' special check for a stranded Helo if GetPlayerID("Helo") > 0 then if GetPlayerLoc(GetPlayerID("Helo")) = "Stranded on Caprica" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_AssignmentCol,_AssignmentRow).string = "Helo" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_AssignmentCol + 1,_AssignmentRow).string = "STRANDED on Caprica" asgnCnt = 1 end if end if
player = "" for asgnID = 1 to 7 player=GetAssigned(asgnID) if player <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_AssignmentCol,_AssignmentRow + asgnCnt).string = player BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_AssignmentCol + 1,_AssignmentRow + asgnCnt).string = StripAssign(GetAssignmentName(asgnID)) asgnCnt = asgnCnt +1 end if player = "" next asgnID end sub 'Board_RefreshPlayerAssignments
sub Board_RefreshVipers dim viperstr as string dim sectorID, viperidx, ShipCnt, vipercnt, shiptype, playerID as integer
if GetInitFlag() then exit sub end if
InitializeSectors GetBS
for sectorID = 1 to 6 for viperidx = 1 to 4 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID)+1,SectorRow(sectorID)+_ViperRowOffset + viperidx).string = "" next viperidx
ShipCnt = 0 vipercnt = GetVipersBySector(sectorID, _ShipViper) if vipercnt > 0 then ShipCnt = ShipCnt + 1 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID)+1,SectorRow(sectorID)+_ViperRowOffset+ShipCnt).string = "Viper x" & vipercnt end if
vipercnt = GetVipersBySector(sectorID, _ShipMarkVII) if vipercnt > 0 then ShipCnt = ShipCnt + 1 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID) + 1, SectorRow(sectorID) + _ViperRowOffset+ShipCnt).string = "Mark VII x" & vipercnt end if
vipercnt = GetVipersBySector(sectorID, _ShipAssaultRaptor) if vipercnt > 0 then ShipCnt = ShipCnt + 1 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID) + 1, SectorRow(sectorID) + _ViperRowOFfset + shipcnt).string = "Assault Raptor x" & vipercnt end if
for playerID = 1 to PlayerCnt() viperstr = "" if GetPlayerLoc(playerID) = "Sector " & sectorID then ShipCnt = ShipCnt + 1 if GetPlayerViper(playerID) < 10 then viperstr = " (V)" elseif GetPlayerViper(playerID) < 20 then viperstr = " (M)" else viperstr = " (A)" end if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID)+1,SectorRow(sectorID)+_ViperRowOffset+ShipCnt).string = GetPlayerName(playerID) & viperstr end if next playerID next sectorID end sub
sub Board_RefreshCivilians dim ShipID, ShipCount, ShipRowOffset, ShipColOffset, j as integer dim sectorID dim ShipName as string
if GetInitFlag() then exit sub end if
InitializeSectors GetBS
for sectorID = 1 to 6 'clear out the sector first for j = 1 to 6 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID)+2,SectorRow(sectorID)+j).string = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID)+3,SectorRow(sectorID)+j).string = "" next j ShipCount=0 ShipID= GetCivilianBySector (sectorID, 0) do while ShipID > 0 ShipCount = ShipCount + 1 shipname = GetShipName (_ShipCivilian, ShipID) if ShipCount < 7 then ShipRowOffset = ShipCount ShipColOffset = 2 else ShipRowOffset = ShipCount - 6 ShipColOffset = 3 end if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(SectorCol(sectorID)+ShipColOffset,SectorRow(sectorID)+ShipRowOffset).string = shipname ShipID= GetCivilianBySector (sectorID, ShipID) loop next sectorID end sub 'Board_RefreshCivilians
function ColonialOneAvailable as boolean GetBS ColonialOneAvailable=(BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_Colonial1Col,_Colonial1Row).String = "" and IsGamePhase(_PhaseInSpace)) end function
function PegasusAvailable as boolean GetBS PegasusAvailable = (GameTypeIsPegasus() and BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PegasusCol,_PegasusRow).String = "") end function
function HubDestroyed as boolean GetBS HubDestroyed = BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_HubDestroyedCol,_HubDestroyedRow).String <> "" end function
sub SetDRBBAllegiance (allegiance as string) GetBS
BoardSheet.getCellByPosition(_DRBBAllegianceCol, _DRBBAllegianceRow).string = allegiance end sub
function DRBBAllegiance as string GetBS
DRBBAllegiance = BoardSheet.getCellByPosition(_DRBBAllegianceCol, _DRBBAllegianceRow).string end function
sub Board_SetSpecial (effect as string) GetBS dim offseth,offsetv, i,j as integer dim foundeffect as boolean foundeffect=TRUE
if effect = "Colonial One" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_Colonial1Col, _Colonial1Row).String = "Colonial One Destroyed" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_Colonial1Col, _Colonial1Row).CellBackColor = _red BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_Colonial1Col, _Colonial1Row + 1).CellBackColor = _red for i = _Colonial1Col to _Colonial1Col + 3 for j = _Colonial1Row + 2 to _Colonial1Row + 5 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(i, j).CellBackColor = _red next j next i
elseif effect = "Detector Sabotage" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DetectorCol, _DetectorRow).String = "Detector Sabotage" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DetectorCol, _DetectorRow).CellBackColor = _red
elseif effect = "Pegasus" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PegasusCol, _PegasusRow).String = "Pegasus Destroyed" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PegasusCol, _PegasusRow).CellBackColor = _red BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PegasusCol, _PegasusRow + 1).CellBackColor = _red for i = _PegasusCol to _PegasusCol + 3 for j = _PegasusRow + 2 to _PegasusRow + 5 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(i, j).CellBackColor = _red next j next i
elseif effect = "Hub Destroyed" then BoardSheet.getCellByPosition(_HubDestroyedCol, _HubDestroyedRow).string = "Hub Destroyed" BoardSheet.getCellByPosition(_HubDestroyedCol, _HubDestroyedRow).CellBackColor = _red
else select case effect case "Ambush" offseth = 0 offsetv = 0 case "Cylon Swarm" offseth = 2 offsetv = 0 case "Jammed Assault" offseth = 5 offsetv = 0 case "Thirty-Three" offseth = 7 offsetv = 0 case "Dogfight" offseth = 0 offsetv = -4 case "Scar" offseth = 3 offsetv = -4 case "The Guardians" offseth = 7 offsetv = -4 case "Lockdown" offseth = 7 offsetv = -6 case "Hornet's Nest" offseth = 7 offsetv = -7 case "Event Horizon" offseth = 7 offsetv = -2 case else foundeffect = FALSE end select
if foundeffect then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+ offseth,_SpecialsRow+ offsetv).String = effect BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+ offseth,_SpecialsRow+ offsetv).CellBackColor = _red end if end if end sub
sub Board_ClearSpecial (which as string) GetBS dim i as integer
'+== clean up specials if which = "Thirty-Three" then if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow).CellBackColor = _white MsgBox "Special: Thirty-Three is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Thirty-Three is no longer in effect." end if
elseif which = "Jump" or which = "All" then if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Ambush is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Ambush is no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+2,_SpecialsRow).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+2,_SpecialsRow).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+2,_SpecialsRow).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Cylon Swarm is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Cylon Swarm is no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+5,_SpecialsRow).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+5,_SpecialsRow).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+5,_SpecialsRow).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Jammed Assault is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Jammed Assault is no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow-4).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow-4).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow-4).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Dogfight is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Dogfight is no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+3,_SpecialsRow-4).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+3,_SpecialsRow-4).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+3,_SpecialsRow-4).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Scar is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Scar is no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-4).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-4).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-4).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: The Guardians are no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: The Guardians are no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-6).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-6).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-6).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Lockdown is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Lockdown is no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-7).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-7).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-7).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Hornet's Nest is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Hornet's Nest is no longer in effect." end if end if if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-2).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-2).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-2).CellBackColor = _white if which <> "All" then MsgBox "Special: Event Horizon is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Event Horizon is no longer in effect." end if end if
if which = "All" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DetectorCol,_DetectorRow).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_DetectorCol,_DetectorRow).CellBackColor = _white
BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_Colonial1Col,_Colonial1Row).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_Colonial1Col,_Colonial1Row).CellBackColor = _white BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_Colonial1Col,_Colonial1Row+1).CellBackColor = _bluegrey for i = _Colonial1Col to _Colonial1Col + 3 for j = _Colonial1Row + 2 to _Colonial1Row + 5 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(i,j).CellBackColor = _bluegrey next j next i
BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PegasusCol,_PegasusRow).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PegasusCol,_PegasusRow).CellBackColor = _white BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PegasusCol,_PegasusRow+1).CellBackColor = _bluegrey for i =_PegasusCol to _PegasusCol + 3 for j = _PegasusRow + 2 to _PegasusRow + 5 BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(i,j).CellBackColor = _bluegrey next j next i
BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol + 7,_SpecialsRow).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol + 7,_SpecialsRow).CellBackColor = _white DisableThirtyThree
BoardSheet.getCellByPosition(_DRBBAllegianceCol, _DRBBAllegianceRow).string = "Unallied"
BoardSheet.getCellByPosition(_HubDestroyedCol, _HubDestroyedRow).string = "" BoardSheet.getCellByPosition(_HubDestroyedCol, _HubDestroyedRow).CellBackColor = _white
end if elseif which = "Scar" then if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol + 3,_SpecialsRow - 4).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol + 3,_SpecialsRow - 4).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol + 3,_SpecialsRow - 4).CellBackColor = _white MsgBox "Special: Scar is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Scar is no longer in effect." end if elseif which = "DogFight" then if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow-4).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow-4).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol,_SpecialsRow-4).CellBackColor = _white MsgBox "Special: Dogfight is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Dogfight is no longer in effect." end if elseif which = "Lockdown" then if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-6).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-6).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-6).CellBackColor = _white MsgBox "Special: Lockdown is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Lockdown is no longer in effect." end if elseif which = "Hornet's Nest" then if BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-7).String <> "" then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-7).String = "" BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_SpecialsCol+7,_SpecialsRow-7).CellBackColor = _white MsgBox "Special: Hornet's Nest is no longer in effect." LogThis "Special: Hornet's Nest is no longer in effect." end if end if end sub
sub Board_EmptyGraves dim i as integer GetBS
for i = 0 to 9 Boardsheet.GetCellByPosition(_GraveCol,_GraveRow+i).String = "" next i end sub
sub DumpBody (corpse as String) dim i as integer GetBS
i = 0 do until Boardsheet.GetCellByPosition(_GraveCol,_GraveRow+i).String = "" i = i + 1 loop Boardsheet.GetCellByPosition(_GraveCol,_GraveRow+i).String = corpse end sub
function IsACorpse (playername as string) as boolean dim currow as integer GetBS
IsACorpse = FALSE currow = _GraveRow do until Boardsheet.GetCellByPosition(_GraveCol,currow).String = "" if Boardsheet.GetCellByPosition(_GraveCol,currow).String = playername then IsACorpse=TRUE exit do end if currow = currow + 1 loop end function 'IsACorpse
sub Board_SetJumpTrack (jumpstate as integer) dim i as integer GetBS
for i = 0 to 4 if jumpstate = i then if i < 3 then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_JumpTrackCol + i,_JumpTrackRow).CellBackColor = _red else BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_JumpTrackCol + i,_JumpTrackRow).CellBackColor = _blue end if else BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_JumpTrackCol + i,_JumpTrackRow).CellBackColor = _bluegrey end if next i end sub
sub Board_SetPursuitTrack (pursuitState as integer) dim i as integer GetBS
for i = 0 to 3 if pursuitState = i then BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PursuitTrackCol+i,_PursuitTrackRow).CellBackColor = _red else BoardSheet.GetCellByPosition(_PursuitTrackCol+i,_PursuitTrackRow).CellBackColor = _bluegrey end if next i end sub
sub Initialize_Board
SetCurrentTask("Refreshing Location Damage") Board_RefreshLocationDamage SetCurrentTask("Refreshing Player Assignments") Board_RefreshPlayerAssignments SetCurrentTask("Refreshing Player Locations") Board_RefreshPlayerLoc SetCurrentTask("Refreshing Player Titles") Board_RefreshPlayerTitles SetCurrentTask("Refreshing Vipers") Board_RefreshVipers SetCurrentTask("Refreshing Civilians") Board_RefreshCivilians SetCurrentTask("Clearing All Special Attributes") Board_ClearSpecial("All") SetCurrentTask("Emptying the Graveyard") Board_EmptyGraves
end sub
